param.name: Enable Thrust During Turn
param.desc: Assist the turn using the thruster

param.name: Minimum Speed for Thrust
param.desc: Speed [m/s] below which thruster is used

param.name: Yaw PID Gains Transect
param.desc: PID gains for YAW controller during straight line

param.name: Yaw PID Gains Turning
param.desc: PID gains for YAW controller during turn

param.name: Ramp Actuation Limit
param.desc: Ramp actuation limit when the value is rising in actuation per second

param.name: Log PID Parcels
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Activate LP Filtering
param.desc: Activate Low-pass filtering of computed rudder angle

param.name: Activate N Filtering
param.desc: Activate Notch filtering of computed rudder angle

param.name: Activate BS Filtering
param.desc: Activate Band-stop filtering of computed rudder angle

param.name: Activate External Filtering
param.desc: Activate external user-defined filtering of computed rudder angle

param.name: LPF scaling
param.desc: Low-pass filter gain to remove HF components

param.name: BSF scaling
param.desc: BSF scaling percentage around cut-off estimated frequency

param.name: Desired Course Percentage Increase
param.desc: Incremental portioning during desired course change.

param.name: Desired Course Difference Threshold
param.desc: Minimum desired course change that triggers low-pass filtring.

param.name: Desired turning rate
param.desc: User-defined desired turning rate in rad/s.

param.name: Report Timeout
param.desc: Timeout threshold to report Entity error

param.name: Default Monitoring -- Hardware
param.desc: Additional default entities to monitor in Hardware profile

param.name: Maximum Consecutive Transitions
param.desc: Maximum number of consecutive transitions before starting to ignore

param.name: Convert Height to Geoid Height
param.desc: Convert WGS84 height to geoid height (mean sea level) height

param.name: Compute Progress
param.desc: True if plan progress should be computed

param.name: Fuel Prediction
param.desc: True if plan's fuel prediction should be computed

param.name: Perform Calibration
param.desc: True if calibration should be performed at all

param.name: Abort On Failed Activation
param.desc: Abort when a payload fails to activate

param.name: StationKeeping Speed in RPM
param.desc: Speed in RPM for the station keeping

param.name: IMU Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the IMU for fuel prediction

param.name: Plan Generator Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the Plan Generator

param.name: Dive depth
param.desc: Depth to dive in response to 'dive' command

param.name: Traveling depth
param.desc: Depth to use when traveling (Goto maneuvers)

param.name: Dive seconds
param.desc: Time to be under water in response to 'dive' command (seconds)

param.name: Loiter radius
param.desc: Radius of generated loiter and station keeping maneuvers

param.name: RPM Speed
param.desc: Speed in RPMs to be used in the generated maneuvers

param.name: Generate At Boot
param.desc: Set of commands for plans to generate at boot

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Output Timeout
param.desc: Timeout before a configuration is set.

param.name: ROT Time Constant
param.desc: Rate of Turn time constant for v104s GPS compass, GPROT message.

param.name: COG Time Constant
param.desc: Course over ground time constant for v104s GPS compass, GPVTG.

param.name: Heading Time Constant
param.desc: Heading time constant for v104s GPS compass, GPVTG.

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Vital Entities
param.desc: Relevant entities that are always considered regardless of ignoring errors during plan execution

param.name: Allows External Control
param.desc: Allow for the vehicle to be externally controlled

param.name: Maneuver Handling Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for starting or stopping a maneuver

param.name: Ignored Interfaces
param.desc: List of interfaces whose services will not be announced

param.name: Loading Order
param.desc: List of messages ordered by loading order

param.name: Reception timeout
param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages

param.name: Transports
param.default: Chlorophyll, CompassHeading, Conductivity, CpuUsage, Current, Depth, Distance, EntityState, EstimatedFreq, Fluorescein, FuelLevel, GpsFix, Heartbeat, LblConfig, LblRange, LblRangeAcceptance, Phycocyanin, Phycoerythrin, Power, PowerSettings, PowerChannelState, Pressure, RelativeWind, RhodamineDye, RSSI, Rpm, Salinity, SoundSpeed, StorageUsage, Temperature, Turbidity, VesselWind, Voltage, PH, Redox

param.name: Flush Interval
param.desc: Number of second to wait before forcing data to be written to disk

param.name: Transports

param.desc: Local UDP port to listen on

param.name: Static Destinations
param.desc: List of <IPv4>:<Port> destinations that will always receive outgoing messages

param.name: Rate Limiters

param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Announce this transport to services or not

param.desc: Allow underwater communication when limited comms are being simulated
